title: [Vol.6] Jerome Engel (UC Berkeley Haas) 11/23, 10:00~12:00
author: 경영공학부 마케팅·취업지원실 강동준
content:
⊙ 일정 : 11월 23일(화) 오전 10시 ~ 오후 12시
⊙ 참여 : https://youtu.be/i6MSRXRKsFI 
  - Youtube channel "KAIST College of Business"
⊙ 사전 질문 : Jerome Engel(UC Berkeley Haas)의 강연 주제에 대하여 직접 묻고 싶은 내용이 있다면, 아래 링크에 질문을 남겨주세요. 
사전 접수된 질문 중 Q&A 세션을 통해 연사에게 직접 질의할 수 있는 Zoom link를 보내드립니다.
  - https://forms.gle/1TuT7ZkUiy8B46d2A 
⊙ 연사(Jerome Engel) : Professor Jerome Engel is an Emeritus Adjunct Professor at the Haas School of Business, UC Berkeley, and a Senior Fellow at the Lester Center for Entrepreneurship and Innovation. 
Professor Engel is an internationally renowned expert in innovation, entrepreneurship, and capital, and he provides lectures for leaders of the world’s corporations and governments.

Currently pioneering the Lean Launchpad innovation in the United States and around the world with Professor Steve Blank, Professor Jerome Engel will talk about "Start Up Culture, The Culture of Innovation." to KAIST members.
